actions.description: The hadozee makes two Shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Light Crossbow

specialTraits.description: If it isn't incapacitated or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.
specialTraits.name: Glide
